name: Craft Commander
description:
Craft weapons and armies on a puzzle board and conquer territories! Welcome to Craft Commander, a unique blend of puzzles and strategy.

Unlock more advanced crafting techniques and build more sophisticated weapons as you progress: you’ll become the commander of an unstoppable army.

Craft Commander Features:
- It’s easy and fun: Match materials on a puzzle board to craft cool weapons.
- Arm your soldiers with the right tools for every battle and watch them crush their enemies.
- Explore different regions as you progress through the world!
- Never give up! Some challenging levels will keep you replaying until you win.
- Beware of the bosses: You’ll need to up your strategy to defeat them.

Craft Commander is FREE to download and FREE to play.

Enjoying Craft Commander? Drop us a nice review :)

If you want to learn more about the game, you can follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CraftCommanderGame
